name: You are the monster
description:
Customize your creature and scare the townsfolk! Earn scare points to unlock more creature parts to get a higher scare rating.

A game made for the Ludum Dare game jam #33. This was my first game jam and unfortunately i didn't have time to finish the project but it was a fun experience and i will definitely be taking part in more in the future with hope to actually finish one :) The basic game idea is in so it should be playable in its most basic form.
